comments: Equals row sums of triangle A164738. Example: a(4) = 33 = sum of terms in row 4 of triangle A164738: (2, 3, 5, 3, 5, 7, 5, 3). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 23 2009
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 21 2010
